Talk016:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thank you so much. Now I can return
with my head held high.
Talk017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The caves around here are a good place
to duck out of the cold, <sp:5:0:0>but be careful of
lurking monsters.<sp:0:4:0>Some of them have pools of freezing
water, too, on top of the normal cold.
Always stay alert for danger.
Talk013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Well, look who it is! Thanks for bringing
me those chillshrooms.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I would've been so embarrassed coming
back with nothing to show for it. You
really helped me save face!
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Now that my wing's healed, I'm patrolling
the village, checking for signs of damage
from the blizzard.
The snow has stopped now, but that stuff
was piled up everywhere for a long time.
There might be lasting damage.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401>What if the bridge gives way while
somebody's walking on it? I can't let
that happen!
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration_01>Notts is helping out too. I gotta say,
for a kid, she's a pretty good patroller.
Talk014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The snow has stopped now, but that stuff
was piled up everywhere for a long time.
There might be lasting damage.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401>What if the bridge gives way while
somebody's walking on it? I can't let
that happen!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Admiration_01>Notts is helping out too. I gotta say,
for a kid, she's a pretty good patroller.
Talk015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Notts and I are patrolling the village
together. We haven't noticed too much
damage, which is good.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But I won't give the all-clear for kids
to start running around yet. Not until I'm
sure it's safe!
